questions.question: Considering the overall form and purpose, what primary function does this product serve as clearly indicated on the label?

What is the apparent shape of the container holding the product, observed from a frontal perspective?
Judging from the visual texture of the bottle, what material does it seem to be constructed from?
What is the prominent color of the botanical illustrations featured on the product's label?
Disregarding the brand name, what descriptive term best characterizes the product's intended effect, as shown on the label?
What type of plant is depicted in the graphic design adorning the product's label?
What is the visible closure mechanism at the top of the product's container?
What seems to be the overall style of the product's label design, in terms of aesthetic?
What secondary color, besides white and green, is present in the label's design?
Observing the bottom of the container, what information might be present there, though unreadable?
What brand name is clearly displayed on the label of the product?
What secondary plant-based ingredient, besides green tea, is mentioned on the product's label?
